pricing_section.subtitle: Transparent and result-oriented digital solution packages, suitable for every budget and need.
pricing_section.plan1_description: Fast growth kit for new brands.

pricing_section.plan3_feature1: Full corporate website + custom dashboard pages
pricing_section.faq1_answer: Yes, we offer a free initial consultation for every package. You can contact us to discuss your project details and determine the most suitable solution for you.
pricing_section.faq2_answer: Our projects are generally one-time services and are completed within the specified delivery time. Flexible monthly subscriptions are available for maintenance and support services.
pricing_section.faq3_answer: We offer bank transfer/EFT and credit card payment options. For larger projects, we can provide flexible payment plans.
pricing_section.faq4_answer: In case of cancellation after project commencement, billing will be based on the amount of work completed. Please refer to our contract for detailed information.
